about_the_game:
Play as a young mountain goat on his journey of revenge against an oppressive dictator in this enjoyable yet challenging pixel platformer.

Fast and Fluid Platforming

Jump, Climb and Swing past challenging obstacles with several unique abilities that challenges players to master Boki's movement with confidence and satisfaction.

Expressive Combat

Face challenging and varied enemies with a wide range of weapons, skills and items that make Boki a uniquely difficult yet satisfying character to master.

Immersive Exploration

Embark on a mesmerizing journey through meticulously crafted biomes and areas that present uniquely difficult platforming challenges. Unearth hidden secrets as you delve deeper into Mount Goatmore's mysterious world.

Meet Whimsical Characters

Engage in conversations, trade goods, and negotiate alliances with the diverse inhabitants of Mount Goatmore's ecosystem. Forge meaningful connections with an eclectic cast of characters who will test and bolster Boki's resolve on his relentless ascent towards the peak, where he seeks to topple the Goatfather's tyrannical rule.

short_description: Boki is a Metroidvania, Choose your own adventure, RPG, Precision platformer in which you play as a young mountain goat who must climb a mountain in search of revenge. Dodge, battle and fluidly maneuver through several uniquely crafted areas and biomes to explore the secrets of a tyrannical kingdom.
